entry.p: I've just posted an essay of mine entitled The Conceptual Nature of Art, which contains the fundamentals of my interpretation of Ayn Rand's philosophy of art. Although I originally submitted it to The Journal of Ayn Rand Studies, I've decided to remove it from consideration since the anonymous reader's comments requested a thorough overhaul and I simply can no longer muster the energy and enthusiasm to work that hard on interpreting Ayn Rand. So I present it as-is, and in the public domain. Enjoy!
